content: this chunky blanket is a fun beginner friendly crochet pattern i worked this up in just a few days because of the super bulky yarn lion brand thick & quick that i used this is one of those patterns that once you get the first few row in you are good to let your mind go and just crochet i have to admit that i sat in front of the tv with my pajamas coffee and netflix for about two evenings while working on this but who doesn t love to crochet & netflix binge available in 5 sizes baby twin full queen & king
